name: TrapTacular
description:
Fun local 2-players game based on furtive and strategy!

It can be played with two gamepads and/or one keyboard for both players.

Mechanics:

  • If you shoot the opponent, you will win the round.
  • If you take the pickup (blue sphere), you will reveal your opponent until the end of the round.
  • If you step on a trap (purple tile with a skull), it will detonate an explosion after few seconds. Advice: Do not stand on this :)
  • There are destructible walls that can be shot.
  • There are tiles that act as a switch and will lower down specific tiles. Advice: Be careful that you may get stuck :)

Controls:

  • Keyboard ( [AWSD] or [Arrows] to move, [Space] or [Enter] to shoot)
  • Gamepad (Joystick to move / A or X to shoot)

Made by Emmanuel & Cain for Ankama Game Jam.
